conversation.content: Um. Hi. I have a— Er, there's this charge? On my HSA. Card.
Okay so let me just, um, pull up your account here real quick— sorry, it's been a crazy morning— can I get your member ID?
It's, uh, wait— Sorry, it's MED— no, MEH. Um. MEH-7823.
Got it got it, so MEH-7823, and um, I'm seeing here that— okay so there's a charge from yesterday for $47.82, transaction ID TXN-9847-QM2, is that the one?
Yes! That's— I mean, um, I didn't. Buy anything? Yesterday?
Right so, um, let me dig into this a bit more here, sometimes these take a day to post so it might actually be from— oh wait, hmm, this is interesting.
Interesting? Um. Good? Or bad?
So basically what happened is, uh, this charge— it's coded as RMB-4721-X which is, um, a reimbursement credit actually, not a charge, the system just displays it weird.
Wait. Really? Um, it's— you mean they're giving me? Money?
Yeah exactly, so like someone from your employer submitted a, uh, wellness reimbursement claim CLM-8374-B2 for your flu shot last month and it just, um, posted backwards on the app.
Oh my— um, wow. I'm so— Er, I feel stupid. Sorry.
No no no, honestly? This happens like, um, fifty times a day, the way our system shows credits is, uh, completely ridiculous, I keep telling them to fix it.
Really? Um. That's— wait, so it's forty-seven? Back?
Yep yep, so confirmation number CNF-9982-AA7 for your records, and um, it should show correctly in like, uh, two hours once the system refreshes.
This is— um, I was so stressed! Er, being a phlebotomist. HSA is tight. You know?
Oh totally, healthcare workers get the worst benefits which is, um, pretty ironic if you ask me— so anyway your new balance after this credit posts will be, uh, let's see here, $284.19.
That's. Um. That's actually great? Really great. Er, thank you.
So like, is there anything else I can, um, help with today? Oh and just so you know, reference number REF-7729-MK3 if you need to call back about this.
No I'm— um, I'm good. Sorry again. For being. Er. Worried about nothing.
Seriously don't even worry about it, like I said, our display is, uh, basically designed to confuse people so— anyway you have a good rest of your day, okay?
